name: Cat Girl Creator
description:
Ever wanted to create your very own cat girl? Now you can with the official CloudNovel® Cat Girl Creator! Customize your cat girl or "neko chan" to create the cat girl of your dreams!

Features


  • 2 Variation School Uniforms
  • 6 Interchangeable Hairstyles
  • 5+ Different facial expressions
  • Saving your character as a transparent .PNG image
